name: Stealthy, Mythic

sections.text: The bonus on Escape Artist and Stealth skill checks from Stealthy increases by 2. In addition, you can expend one use of mythic power to treat an Escape Artist or Stealth check as if you had rolled a natural 20. You must decide to use this ability before making the roll.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your grace and fluidity are beyond compare.
